Class GeomCmdHdr

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.colorado.cires.cmg.mvt.encoding.GeomCmdHdr

extends Object
    Utilities for working with geometry command headers.
    See Also:
    GeomCmd

    • Method Detail

      • cmdHdr

        public static int cmdHdr(GeomCmd cmd,
                         int length)

        Encodes a 'command header' with the first 3 LSB as the command id, the remaining bits as the command length. See the vector-tile-spec for details.

        Parameters:
        cmd - command to execute
        length - how many times the command is repeated
        Returns:
        encoded 'command header' integer

      • getCmdLength

        public static int getCmdLength(int cmdHdr)
        Get the length component from the 'command header' integer.
        Parameters:
        cmdHdr - encoded 'command header' integer
        Returns:
        command length

      • getCmdId

        public static int getCmdId(int cmdHdr)
        Get the id component from the 'command header' integer.
        Parameters:
        cmdHdr - encoded 'command header' integer
        Returns:
        command id

      • getCmd

        public static GeomCmd getCmd(int cmdHdr)
        Get the id component from the 'command header' integer, then find the GeomCmd with a matching id.
        Parameters:
        cmdHdr - encoded 'command header' integer
        Returns:
        command with matching id, or null if a match could not be made

      • closePathCmdHdr

        public static int closePathCmdHdr()
        Returns:
        encoded 'command header' integer for GeomCmd.ClosePath.
